level.heading: Judicial and administrative review of actions of board.
level.text: Any person aggrieved by a final decision of a board or the Mayor may appeal the decision to the District of Columbia Court of Appeals pursuant to § 2-510.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-99, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1201.01.
